text:
Highly doubt the proficiency and skills of the doctors here. Was issued hydrocortisone steroid cream for eye eczema only to learn that steroids should NOT be applied around the eyes by other clinic. I was told that it could pose risks to my eyes such as cataracts in the long run.

Not only did I not recover from my condition for a month, but was issued something detrimental to my eyes instead?  ðŸ˜‚ do not recommend

Fuss-free visit!

Was served by Elayne and Dr Lisa for a common cold, and their service was impeccable. Despite being under the weather, this team of patient staff really made the visit more pleasant

Visited on 11 February 2025 and the locum on duty was Ashley. Never had I come across such a condescending and dismissive doctor - if you lack compassion or patience, you are clearly in the wrong profession.  Not to mention she was using her phone during the consultation, on my time - show some basic respect to your patients.

call their phone never pick up, I had been calling for few days just asking some details. I nearby so visit their clinic, just m in front of their clinic, that time the receptionist is not engaging with anyone, and I called also never pickup, please update the phone number if not just delete.

Very friendly receptionist. she's helpful to enquiries even thou no doctors around that day and I have so many questions for her
. Her name is Elayne.
